## Type
- [ ] New Tile Color
- [ ] New Palette
- [ ] Both

## For New Colors

### Color Information
| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Color Name | |
| RGB (r, g, b) | |
| Design ID | 98138 |
| Element ID | |
| Is Standard | true/false |

### Source
Where did you find this color information? (BrickLink, official source, physical tile, etc.)

## For New Palettes

### Palette Information
| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| Palette ID | |
| Palette Name | |
| Canvas Width | |
| Canvas Height | |

### Elements in Palette
List the element IDs and quantities:
```
element_id, count
12345, 100
67890, 50
...
```

### Source
Link to official page or inventory source.

## Additional Notes
Any other relevant information.
